ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), warn your closest relatives.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And warn your tribe of near kindred.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And warn thy clan, thy nearest kin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And warn thy tribe of near kindred,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And warn thou thy clan, the nearest ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Warn the nearest of your kinsfolk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And warn your tribe (O Muhammad SAW) of near kindred.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Warn your tribe and your near kinsmen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:214] And warn the nearest of your kinsfolk, namely, the Banū Hāshim and the Banū al-Muttalib: ‘He [the Prophet] warned them publicly …’, as reported by al-Bukhārī and Muslim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And warn thy tribe of near kindred) your blood relations,
